---
title: "Resources for learning R"
---

## Books (free online)

-   [*R for Data Science*](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/) by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund

-   [*Tidy Modeling with R*](https://tmwr.org) by Max Kuhn & Julia Silge

## RStudio Primers

- [Interactive LearnR Tutorial](https://learnr.numbat.space/)

- [R Primers](https://r-primers.andrewheiss.com/) for full list of tutorials. Note that we will be using a simplified version of ggplot2 in this course.

## Additional resources

-   [RStudio Cheatsheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/)

-   [R Fun](https://rfun.library.duke.edu/#portfolio) workshops and videos by Duke Center for Data and Visualization Sciences.
